Nivek asked you to kill Vekas, the Wicked Tree.

It was your toughest fight yet, but you prevailed and destroyed the rampant ghilliedhu.

You then travelled further south to Tower Base, and met Tribune Adria.

It's tough keeping morale up here. We've lost a lot of people, but those who remain are stronger for the experience.

Case in point--that crazed ghilliedhu over there, Vekas. I keep the road clear as best I can, but every so often I head over and chop him down to size.

Say, you've got that "newly-learned skill" look about you. Care to give it a try yourself?

Well fought, . It might not seem like much, but all we soldiers can really depend on in a place like this are each other.

Head on up this hill to Tower Base, and give Adria my regards.

So, another new recruit!

I can't blame you, as soon as I heard about the Island of Dawn I had to come here myself!

This is the Northern Overwatch, a campsite for those who protect the Tower Base. We expect you to keep up the good work.

Follow this road and you will find Tribune Adria at the Tower Base. I'm sure she's waiting for your reports.

Welcome to the Island of Dawn, .

Our mission here is to protect our researchers from whatever threats they uncover.

Most of the people you'll meet here are seasoned veterans, due to return home soon. Learn from them while you can, and I'm sure you'll do fine.

My adjutant, Jorhon, will give you your next orders.
